ourTeam.text: For each project, we form a team that includes a project manager, business analyst, UI / UX designer, DevOps, QA engineer, backend and front-end developers.

direction.text1: In collaboration with startups, we have learned how to create a creative and functional user interface for mobile applications.
direction.text2: IT Systems of any level of complexity at a convenient time for you
direction.text3: Our company takes a human-centered approach to design
direction.text4: Our experienced professionals will help you optimize your infrastructure
direction.text5: We can improve the qualifications of your employees thereby increasing the efficiency of your company.

product.text1: Smsuz.uz - It is a platform for bulk SMS messaging.
product.text2: Delever - Delivery service automation targeted at both consumers and restaurants.
product.text3: Goodzone - Internet shop of household appliances in Uzbekistan.
product.text4: Iman - It is a mutual financing platform based on the principles of Islamic Finance. Buyers, sellers and investors meet here.

howWeWork.text1: Send us your project request or project idea.
howWeWork.text2: We will contact you to clarify your project requirements.
howWeWork.text3: We will provide you with our free, non-binding application.
howWeWork.text4: We provide a team for your requirements.
howWeWork.text5: You will get to know the team and we'll get started.
